about.name: Terry Lee
about.title: Junior Programmer (Software Developer) @ Hong Kong Hospital Authority
about.bio: I’m a Computer Science grad from the University of Surrey, now a Junior Programmer at the Hong Kong Hospital Authority. I work with ERP systems, make web pages behave, and fix things when they break. I’ve dabbled in full-stack dev and software engineering, and I’m all about fresh ideas and solving problems without breaking too much along the way.

details: Developed and maintained ERP system for Hospital Authority
Assisted and supported staff requests from different departments
Ensured smooth functioning of web pages and features
Guided users through migrations from SharePoint to new system
Collaborated with team members on system improvements
Utilized ASP and .NET programming languages for development tasks
Developed a new enquiry form collecting users’ enquiries and saving them to a database
Handled API integration and rebuilt logic after fetching, leading to a 10% faster processing time
Developed and maintained web applications with Node.js
Optimized front-end components for performance across devices and browsers
Provided technical support and guidance to colleagues
Managed Email Services
Created SQL queries and unit tests
Fixed code, improving algorithm performance by 15%
Administered Linux (Ubuntu OS)
Documented user guidance for staff
Helped with university open day
Guided and introduced courses to visitors
Started and managed a watch-selling business using Instagram and Facebook for marketing
Created and managed an online store using Shopify
Developed business strategies and executed social media campaigns
Clipped and edited YouTube live streams for a translation channel
Achieved a peak of 23.4k subscribers through non-profit content
Added Chinese subtitles for English-speaking videos

projects.title: Earth Walker (working on it)
details: A Flutter application designed to inspire users to explore the world around them.
Encourages real-life map exploration with engaging achievements and medals.
Integrated features for tracking exploration progress and earning rewards.
Developed with Flutter and focuses on software development best practices.

projects.title: DocGPT (ReadmeGPT)
details: Python-based CLI application using OpenAI API.
Automatically generates README.md files for undocumented GitHub repositories.
Scans repositories to create comprehensive documentation for developers.

projects.title: Adaptive Route Planner (Final Year Project)
details: Developed an adaptive route planner web application.
Real-time route planning based on user preferences.
Built with Python and Flask, integrating OpenStreetMap and Nominatim APIs.
Frontend designed with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.

projects.title: Airbnb Development Project Proposal (Project Management)
details: Collaborative project in a team of 5 to modernize properties near Brighton and Hove waterfront.
Contributed to financial analysis, scoping, and budgeting.
Used Microsoft Project for planning, task coordination, and team collaboration.
Enhanced project feasibility through effective time management and budgeting skills.

projects.title: Hangman in Assembly
details: Coursework project written entirely in Assembly Language.
Showcased low-level programming skills and understanding of system architecture.
Developed a functional Hangman game as part of University coursework.

projects.title: Quiz App for Computer Science Students
details: Worked in a group of 5 to create a full-stack quiz application for computer science students.
Used Node.js, HTML, and CSS, following the Waterfall methodology for development.
Integrated with a quiz API for dynamic question retrieval and user engagement.
Added account creation and ranking systems to track scores and encourage competition.

projects.title: Skin Cancer Detection and Classification (AI Image Classification Project)
details: Collaborated in a team of 3 to create a machine learning system for detecting skin cancer.
Used the Ham10000 dataset, applying data preprocessing and augmentation techniques.
Experimented with models like VGG16_bn, ResNet18, and fine-tuned ResNet18.
Integrated BYOL for unsupervised learning to enhance performance with unlabeled data.

certifications: Python for Data Science, AI & Development
fun_fact: I'm a big FPS fan, with over 4,000 hours spent on Overwatch, Apex Legends, and Rainbow Six Siege combined!
I also love cats and dogs if you can't tell.
